result.arabic_text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلنُّجُومَ لِتَهۡتَدُواْ بِهَا فِي ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: Inni (Rabbiin) Isa akka dukkanoowwan dachiifi bahraa keessa isaaniin qajeeltaniif urjiiwwan isiniif godhe sani. Dhugumatti, Nuti keeyyattoota ummata beekaniif addeessinee jirra.
